items.text: slower ball drifts down the leg side for a wide
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Tamim Iqbal, 1 wide

items.text: dipping full-toss on leg stump, Tamim leading-edges it to the covers
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: picked off the pads and placed to the left of midwicket
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: on a length and outside off, driven on the up to long-off
items.postText: Sachith: "@Mizan, Your idea would work if Hathurusinghe is coaching any other team than Sri Lanka. Look the way Tamim handle SL bowlers."
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: short on off, Tamim bisects the two men in the deep. He skips back and short-arm jabs it away between deep fine leg and deep midwicket
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

items.text: slower bouncer, flies over the batsman. Too high and that's been called a wide - the second of the over
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 wide

items.preText: Astamul: "Hathure is trying to stop Tamim with his coaching experience but Tamim is dominating it with his batting experience. "
items.text: keeps it short at off stump, Shakib uses his wrists and turns it to the square-leg region
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.preText: pinkesh: "sorry for my ignorance, but since when Shakib started to come at 1 down, though this move should have been happen long ago" --- This is only the fourth time he's batting at No. 3 in his ODI career
items.text: full on the stumps, Tamim smoothly taps it down to long-on and brings up a smooth fifty - his second in a row in this tri-series
items.shortText: Gunaratne to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: tickled off the pads but straight to midwicket
items.shortText: Gunaratne to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: pretty full on the leg stump, patted down to long-on
items.shortText: Gunaratne to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: glanced off the pads behind square on the leg side
items.shortText: Gunaratne to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: full on off, jabbed into the covers
items.shortText: Gunaratne to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: slower cutter on off, barely 86ks, punched down to long-off
items.shortText: Gunaratne to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: rising short ball outside off, Shakib rises with it and fends it off to backward point
items.postText: Sachith: "Rotate the strike in middle overs. That's what these two doing and what SL never do."
items.shortText: Pradeep to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: turned off the pads to square leg for one
items.shortText: Pradeep to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: full on middle, defended
items.shortText: Pradeep to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: back of a length and angling to a forward-defensive back to the bowler
items.postText: wikum: "Easy runs coming all around..SL bowlers should be more discipline than this. SL need a wicket here, otherwise they'll be in deep trouble.."
items.shortText: Pradeep to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: Tamim dashes down the track and meets this ball early on middle stump. Slapped away to sweeper cover
items.shortText: Pradeep to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: bouncer, angling in on middle, and thuds into the keeper's gloves as Shakib yanks his head out of the way. But the umpire reckons it was too high and calls it a wide
items.shortText: Pradeep to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 wide

items.text: back of a length and angling into Shakib from wide of the crease, played back to the bowler
items.shortText: Pradeep to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: short on off, punched on the up to cover
items.postText: Zeeshan Mahmud: "Tamim is doing to them, what Sanga used to do to us in the mid-2000s."
items.shortText: Gunaratne to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: slid through outside off, chopped fine on the off side, past the left of the keeper
items.shortText: Gunaratne to Tamim Iqbal, 2 runs

items.text: floated full on off, forward and driven straight to extra cover
items.shortText: Gunaratne to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: shot! Tamim races down the track, manufactures a middle-stump half-volley, and launches it straight over the bowler's head. Bam
items.shortText: Gunaratne to Tamim Iqbal, SIX runs

items.text: and again! Tamim did not middle this but managed to drag it straight of long-on. He uses his feet and throws his hands at the ball. The result is just the same, just what Tamim and Bangladesh wanted
items.shortText: Gunaratne to Tamim Iqbal, SIX runs
